org.sensorhub.api.sensor

    Package Description

  • Classes in org.sensorhub.api.sensor used by org.sensorhub.api.sensor 
    Class and Description
    ISensorControlInterface
    Interface to be implemented by all sensor drivers connected to the system Commands can be sent to each sensor controllable input via this interface.
    ISensorDataInterface
    Interface to be implemented by all sensor drivers connected to the system.
    ISensorModule
    Interface to be implemented by all sensor drivers connected to the system
    SensorConfig
    Configuration options for sensors/actuators
    SensorDriverConfig
    Configuration options for sensor/actuator drivers
    SensorEvent
    Simple base data structure for all events generated by sensors (or their drivers)
    SensorEvent.Type
    Possible event types for a SensorEvent
    SensorException
    Exceptions generated by the sensor API
  • Classes in org.sensorhub.api.sensor used by org.sensorhub.impl 
    Class and Description
    ISensorManager
    Management interface for sensors connected to the system
  • Classes in org.sensorhub.api.sensor used by org.sensorhub.impl.persistence 
    Class and Description

    Interface to be implemented by all sensor drivers connected to the system
